dict.string: Associated workflows for the Pennyworth Ruby Gem.

cat << EOB <?xml version="1.0"?> <items> <item uid="aa8c8944-18f8-4165-a2a4-ab073d936dba" arg='pennyworth --string --upcase "{query}"' valid="YES" type="default"> <title>Uppercase</title> <subtitle>Convert all characters to uppercase.</subtitle> <icon>string-uppercase.png</icon> </item> <item uid="de2a88ca-298f-46a7-849a-2cfa8cbdf0d1" arg='pennyworth --string --downcase "{query}"' valid="YES" type="default"> <title>Lowercase</title> <subtitle>Convert all characters to lowercase.</subtitle> <icon>string-lowercase.png</icon> </item> <item uid="b68ce20c-5e07-469a-9d08-08203a921035" arg='pennyworth --string --titleize "{query}"' valid="YES" type="default"> <title>Titleize</title> <subtitle>Capitalize each word and delimit with space or forward slash.</subtitle> <icon>string-titleize.png</icon> </item> <item uid="1ab75806-8cf5-4f79-9094-77946cd2b8ec" arg='pennyworth --string --camelcase "{query}"' valid="YES" type="default"> <title>Camelcase</title> <subtitle>Capitalize each word and delimit with nothing or double colon.</subtitle> <icon>string-camelcase.png</icon> </item> <item uid="06ea20b0-6b54-499c-8c21-c34c9870b621" arg='pennyworth --string --snakecase "{query}"' valid="YES" type="default"> <title>Snakecase</title> <subtitle>Lowercase each word and delimit with underscore or forward slash.</subtitle> <icon>string-snakecase.png</icon> </item> <item uid="f57ef3e2-7d3a-429d-a564-9df0167047c8" arg='pennyworth --string --size "{query}"' valid="YES" type="default"> <title>Size</title> <subtitle>Calculate string size.</subtitle> <icon>string-size.png</icon> </item> </items> EOB
